content: valley of lilies baby blanket yarn used berroco vintage 217 yds 100 grams 4 skeins any worsted weight yarn will work needles 1 us size 8 5 0 mm or size needed to obtain correct gauge with a 32 -40 cable gauge 18-20 sts =4 finished size 32 x 34 1 abbreviations bobble ~ bind off co ~ cast on k ~ knit p ~ purl p2tog ~ purl 2 stitches together st s ~ stitch es yo ~ yarn over using your preferred cast-on method co 138 stitches the pattern is an 18 stitch repeat if a larger blanket is desired increase your co in multiples of 18 stitches start the following seed stitch pattern seed stitch pattern ~row 1 k1 p1 across ~row 2 p1 k1 across repeat the above seed stitch pattern for 2 set-up row right side of work - work seed stitch for 6 sts *k4 p2tog k2 yo k10* repeat from *to* to last 6 sts and work seed stitch pattern maintain the seed stitch pattern on the first and last 6 stitches of every row for the border ~row 1 and every alternate row purl all sts maintaining the seed stitch border this will be the wrong side of your work ~row 2 right side of work - work 6 st border *k4 p2tog k2 yo k5 yo k2 p2tog k1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts and complete border ~row 4 work border *k3 p2tog k2 yo k1 yo k2 p2tog k6* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts work border 2 ~row 6 work border *k2 p2tog k2 yo k3 yo k2 p2tog k5* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts work border ~row 8 work border k1 p2tog k2 yo k5 yo k2 p2tog k4* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts work border ~row 10 work border *k6 p2tog k2 yo k1 yo k2 p2tog k3* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts work border ~row 12 work border *k5 p2tog k2 yo k3 yo k2 p2tog k2* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts work border these 12 row form the pattern repeat pattern 12 more times or to desired length repeat row 1-3 one more time work seed stitch for 2 and bobble loosely block and enjoy 3
